Package andesite.node.util

Class ByteRingBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • andesite.node.util.ByteRingBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Byte>
    public class ByteRingBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Byte>
    Circular buffer of bytes. When the buffer is full, adding a new element removes the oldest. Insertion and random access are O(1).

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put​(byte value)
        Stores a value into this buffer. If the buffer is full, the oldest value is removed.
        Parameters:
        value - Value to store.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears this buffer.

        public int size()
        Returns the size of this buffer.
        Returns:
        The size of this buffer.

      • get

        public byte get​(int n)
        Returns the nth element of this buffer. An index of 0 returns the oldest, an index of size() - 1 returns the newest.
        Parameters:
        n - Index of the wanted element.
        Returns:
        The value of the nth element.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If n >= size().

      • getLast

        public byte getLast()
        Returns the last element of this buffer. Equivalent to getLast(0).
        Returns:
        The last element.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If this buffer is empty.

      • getLast

        public byte getLast​(int n)
        Returns the nth last element of this buffer. An index of 0 returns the newest, an index of size() - 1 returns the oldest.
        Parameters:
        n - Index of the wanted element.
        Returns:
        The value of the nth last element.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If n >= size().
